title: Generation on the wind
creator_credit: David A. Vassar, Joel Silverman, Samanther Shadd and Windmill Movie Company
brief_description: Details the year long construction of a wind generator on the small island of Cutty Hunk off the New England coast by a group of men who apply collective skills to a task new to all of them.
creator_credit_for_label: David A. Vassar, Joel Silverman, Samanther Shadd and Windmill Movie Company
